meanings.definition: A strong alcoholic drink, especially one made from distilled fruit juice.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, Grandpa enjoyed a small glass of schnaps.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a shot of schnaps to the customer.
meanings.sent3: The schnaps was so strong, it made Grandma's eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the schnaps filled the room like a fruity cloud.
meanings.sent5: The schnaps burned pleasantly as it went down, warming him from the inside.

meanings.sent1: He decided to schnaps with his friends to celebrate.
meanings.sent2: She schnapsed the shot quickly before heading out.
meanings.sent3: They planned to schnaps responsibly and not overdo it.
meanings.sent4: The group schnapsed together, toasting to good times.
meanings.sent5: As the clock struck midnight, they all schnapsed in unison, welcoming the new year.
